title: HuskyDEV Sea Bay Watch Face
summary: Interactive Watch Face with cute and nice looking animations.
description: Sea Bay WatchFace has cute and nice looking animations and custom background for every weather.Application is absolutely free and it has core options, but you can purchase PREMIUM version with a lot of features and options.FREE version includes:★ Cutes animation (Lighthouse light, car, boat, plane, space ship, hot air balloon)★ Automatic camera move★ Weather forecast for current day★ Detailed informations of watch battery and phone battery★ Google Fit data for current dayPREMIUM version includes:★ All features from FREE version★ 8 predefined accent text colors★ Weather forecast for upcoming hours and days★ Detailed Google Fit data for current day and last 7 days★ Choose from 3 speed of automatic camera★ Manual camera (move camera view manually)★ Choosing from four batery indicator types★ Choosing from three Google Fit indicator types★ Ability to change Keep watches screen awake interval★ Ability to change Weather update interval★ Ability to change Weather providerConfiguration in companion application contains:★ Time and date format according to phone settings (12/24)★ Enable touch feedback★ Ability to set Grayscale Ambient mode for OLED displays★ Show/Hide Battery indicator★ Show/Hide Google Fit indicator★ Show/Hide Weather indicator★ Ability to change temperature units★ Ability to change wind speed units★ Information about last weather updateThe HuskyDEV Sea Bay Watch Face works great with squared and round watches.Make sure your watch has the Android Wear System 5.0 or higher version.Compatible with:✔ Moto 360✔ Moto 360 2nd generation✔ LG G Watch R✔ LG G Watch✔ Sony Smartwatch 3✔ Samsung Gear Live✔ Asus ZenWatch ✔ LG Watch Urbane✔ Huawei Watch W1✔ TAG Heuer ConnectedFor using Google Fit data in Sea Bay Watch Face, you must confirm dialog on start, that application can read data from your phone.Common synchronization problem solution:If the Application does not appear on your watch please do the following:- uninstall the face application from phone- disconnect watch from phone- restart watch- connect watch and phone again- install Sea Bay Watch Face once again
descriptionHTML:
Sea Bay WatchFace has cute and nice looking animations and custom background for every weather.

Application is absolutely free and it has core options, but you can purchase PREMIUM version with a lot of features and options.

FREE version includes:
★ Cutes animation (Lighthouse light, car, boat, plane, space ship, hot air balloon)
★ Automatic camera move
★ Weather forecast for current day
★ Detailed informations of watch battery and phone battery
★ Google Fit data for current day

PREMIUM version includes:
★ All features from FREE version
★ 8 predefined accent text colors
★ Weather forecast for upcoming hours and days
★ Detailed Google Fit data for current day and last 7 days
★ Choose from 3 speed of automatic camera
★ Manual camera (move camera view manually)
★ Choosing from four batery indicator types
★ Choosing from three Google Fit indicator types
★ Ability to change Keep watches screen awake interval
★ Ability to change Weather update interval
★ Ability to change Weather provider

Configuration in companion application contains:
★ Time and date format according to phone settings (12/24)
★ Enable touch feedback
★ Ability to set Grayscale Ambient mode for OLED displays
★ Show/Hide Battery indicator
★ Show/Hide Google Fit indicator
★ Show/Hide Weather indicator
★ Ability to change temperature units
★ Ability to change wind speed units
★ Information about last weather update

The HuskyDEV Sea Bay Watch Face works great with squared and round watches.

Make sure your watch has the Android Wear System 5.0 or higher version.

Compatible with:
✔ Moto 360
✔ Moto 360 2nd generation
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ LG G Watch
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Asus ZenWatch
✔ LG Watch Urbane
✔ Huawei Watch W1
✔ TAG Heuer Connected

For using Google Fit data in Sea Bay Watch Face, you must confirm dialog on start, that application can read data from your phone.

Common synchronization problem solution:

If the Application does not appear on your watch please do the following:
- uninstall the face application from phone
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart watch
- connect watch and phone again
- install Sea Bay Watch Face once again
comments: Love the animation, just wish the the text was bigger, not everyone has good eyesight
Very cute. Isn't a battery hog I'm a fan of this developer and will collect all these animated ones. Keep them coming.
recentChanges: - Api version for calling sun and moon data is increased to 1.1, without this upgrade  data are not available.
